statements: SELECT program_id, program_name, shopper_id, points_balance FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT program_name, points_balance, shopper_id, program_id FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT points_balance, shopper_id, program_name, program_id FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT program_id, program_name, points_balance FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE points_balance > 100;
SELECT program_id, program_name FROM loyalty_program WHERE shopper_id = 123;
SELECT program_name, points_balance FROM loyalty_program WHERE program_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY points_balance DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT shopper_id) AS total_shoppers, SUM(points_balance) AS total_points FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY shopper_id ASC, points_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE points > 100;
SELECT name, points FROM customers ORDER BY points DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount < 100;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM purchases ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE points > 100 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchases >= 3 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT name, points FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' OR name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY points DESC;

SELECT c.name AS customer_name, p.total_amount FROM customers c INNER JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.total_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY p.total_amount ASC, c.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customers;
SELECT transaction_id, total_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions;
SELECT program_name, rewards_description FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address, program_name FROM customers JOIN loyalty_programs ON customers.loyalty_program_id = loyalty_programs.loyalty_program_id;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE loyalty_program_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, total_amount FROM transactions ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN loyalty_programs ON customers.loyalty_program_id = loyalty_programs.loyalty_program_id;
SELECT customer_name, program_name, rewards_description FROM customers JOIN loyalty_programs ON customers.loyalty_program_id = loyalty_programs.loyalty_program_id WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM shoppers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM shoppers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT program_id, program_name, start_date FROM loyalty_programs WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT shopper_id, total_spent FROM shoppers WHERE total_spent > 1000;
SELECT shopper_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT program_id, program_name, start_date FROM loyalty_programs WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT shopper_id, first_name, last_name, email, birth_date FROM shoppers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT SUM(total_spent) AS total_spent FROM shoppers WHERE birth_date < '1990-01-01';
SELECT p.shopper_id, p.purchase_id, p.total_amount, s.first_name, s.last_name FROM purchases p JOIN shoppers s ON p.shopper_id = s.shopper_id;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customer;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, total_amount FROM transaction ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT r.reward_id, rp.reward_value, l.points, r.reward_type FROM rewards r JOIN loyalty_program l ON r.loyalty_id = l.loyalty_id JOIN redemption rp ON rp.reward_id = r.reward_id;

SELECT t.transaction_id, c.first_name as customer_first_name, c.last_name as customer_last_name, t.transaction_date, t.total_amount FROM transaction t JOIN customer c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id ORDER BY t.transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customer WHERE email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT transaction_id, total_amount FROM transaction ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT rewards.reward_id, loyalty_program.customer_id, rewards.reward_type FROM rewards JOIN loyalty_program ON rewards.loyalty_id = loyalty_program.loyalty_id;
SELECT redemption_id, reward_type, redeemed_points FROM redemption INNER JOIN rewards ON redemption.reward_id = rewards.reward_id WHERE redeemed_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
